features: 【Sewing Machine Needle Threader】The sewing machine needle threader is designed for easy threading, increasing convenience and efficiency with its automatic threading function. The needle threader is suitable for all kinds of household sewing machines and can help you change threads quickly. They also work with regular needles.

【High Applicability】Suitable for most DIY sewing projects, leather, denim, silk, canvas, sewing and jewelry making, sewing and daily use such as embroidery, sewing, crafts, etc.Our needle threader is about 3cm long, is portable and simple, and its exquisite design can be easily stored in your sewing bag, bringing you convenience anytime, anywhere.

【DURABLE TO LAST】The sewing needle threader is made of high quality plastic and metal, this needle threader is durable and long lasting. Its sturdy design holds the needle securely and ensures easy insertion and removal of the sewing machine, simplifying the threading process for a hassle-free sewing process.

【Easy and Convenient】With just one simple step, our needle threader can easily guide the thread through the hole of your sewing machine or needle. Ideal for seniors, minimizes the need for precision manual threading, allows for easy thread changes and increases sewing efficiency even in low light conditions.

【Save Time】Whether you are an experienced craftsman or a sewing enthusiast, this needle threader will quickly become your go-to tool. Turn your sewing experience into a more enjoyable one by saving you valuable time and increasing your productivity.
